prompts: Create a snowy Pokemon with a green body and a cone-shaped head.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter and nature.
Generate an ice-type Pokemon that has a unique mountain-like appearance.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a snowman, complete with icy features.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into snowy forests and mountainous terrains.
Design a Pokemon with frosty arms and a solid base resembling a tree stump.
Show me a Pokemon that combines the elements of ice and grass in its design.

distinctive_features: Snowy texture on the upper body
